20110123153627.000|20110123153628.000|CC1|BUT IT'S FAIR TO SAY THAT YOU   
20110123153628.000|20110123153629.000|CC1|AND THE PRESIDENT HAD A FAIRLY  
20110123153629.000|20110123153632.000|CC1|FROSTY RELATIONSHIP AS IT WERE
